author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Enero Group Announces Acquisition Of Orchard Marketing Pty Ltd
text:
Feb 2 (Reuters) - Enero Group Ltd:
* ANNOUNCES ACQUISITION OF ORCHARD MARKETING * ‍ACQUISITION OF ORCHARD IS EXPECTED TO BE EPS ACCRETIVE OVER NEXT 12 MONTHS​
* ‍PURCHASE PRICE COMPRISES AN INITIAL CASH PAYMENT OF A$5 MILLION​
* ‍FUTURE DEFERRED PAYMENTS ARE SUBJECT TO ACHIEVEMENT OF EBIT TARGETS OVER PERIOD TO 30 JUNE 2021 WITH TOTAL PURCHASE PRICE CAP OF A$27 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
